> "MeowMeow helps you manage your tasks efficiently, so you can focus on more important things... like chasing laser pointers!" ‚Äì _Anonymous Cat_
All you need to do is:

And the best part? **It's completely FREE!**

* Returns the TaskList which has no Tasks if there are no saved Tasks

* Represents a task which can be marked as done or undone

* @return String representation of task for storing in save file.
return (this instanceof ToDo ? "T" : this instanceof Deadline ? "D" : "E") + " | " + (isDone ? "1" : "0") + " | " + description;

return "OK, I've marked this task as not done yet:\n  " + task + "\n";
